name: Get Out Of Hell !
description:
* This is an early prototype of the game. I need you to get feedbacks to improve it and make it a better game. Contact me on Discord or Twitter.Thanks.

=> Hours of devs so far: 60h

Story

In this clicker game, help the devil's son  to Get Out Of Hell and retrieve your love outside. Empower yourself and defeat all your opponents.

Controls & Features

- Click anywhere to make your character hit enemies.

- Open the top right menu and use orbs and hearts to make your character stronger.

- Fulfill achievements to gain orbs and hearts in reward

- "Accept Death" will reset your current area to the begining and all your items purchased with orbs (but not with hearts). In exchange, you will be granted by hearts depending how far you go through the game.
